name: Abandoned (itch) (pyroceper)
description:
You play as a cat and you're owner has abandoned you. It's now up to you to survive.

The game just contains a single level. Sadly, we couldn't complete the game in time due to over scoping. We plan on finishing this game, once the jam results are out!

Thank you, McGill university for hosting such an awesome jam :D

Feel free to take a peek at the source code ;)

Source code:

https://github.com/pyroceper/prj_deserted
